Posts.EditableText: I need to put in some in-game instructions. While the windows.alert() function can put text in a box, I can't move it around. Is there some way in Javascript that would put a dialog box on the screen, one the user would move around and then close with a button? Kinda like every windows box we've ever used, you know?
Posts.HTML: I need to put in some in-game instructions. While the windows.alert() function can put text in a box, I can't move it around. Is there some way in Javascript that would put a dialog box on the screen, one the user would move around and then close with a button? Kinda like every windows box we've ever used, you know?
